archimate:Requirement.name: SC-12(2): Cryptographic Key Establishment and Management | Symmetric Keys
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Produce, control, and distribute symmetric cryptographic keys using [Selection: NIST FIPS-validated; NSA-approved] key management technology and processes.

properties.value: SP 800-56A, SP 800-56B, and SP 800-56C provide guidance on cryptographic key establishment schemes and key derivation methods. SP 800-57-1, SP 800-57-2, and SP 800-57-3 provide guidance on cryptographic key management.
